”Alexa, ask Encyclopedia of Science Fiction to get a quote.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: encyclopedia of science fiction
des: Search the internet Encyclopedia of Science fiction and learn about authors, genres, novels, movies and more. In 2012 this third edition of the encyclopedia received the Hugo as best related work, the BSFA Award for best nonfiction and the European SF Society Award for best promotion of the genre. In May 2013 the visual element not included since the illustrated first edition of 1979 was restored by the institution of the SF Encyclopedia Picture Gallery a now very extensive and still growing archive of cover images from books cited in the above-mentioned bibliographical checklists.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
